title: Vittoria Air-Liner Road doubles as bead lock and run-flat foam liner if you get a flat
content:
Vittoria already offers Air-liners for mountain bikes and gravel bikes, so it only makes sense that road bikes would be next, right? Hold up. Isn’t the point of most tire liners to run lower pressures while protecting the rim and the tire from otherwise-damaging impacts? Unless you’re smashing potholes with low pressures on your road […]

The post Vittoria Air-Liner Road doubles as bead lock and run-flat foam liner if you get a flat appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
